word_mean: 易感者，易受影响者：对传染性疾病无免疫力，因此有受传染的危险

sentence.Network_en: Walking with weights makes the shoulders very susceptible to injury.
sentence.Network_cn: 负重行走时肩膀很容易受伤。

sentence.Network_en: He was, she believes, unusually susceptible to women.
sentence.Network_cn: 她认为他对女人毫无招架之力。

sentence.Network_en: Others are more susceptible to attempts at quantification.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他人更容易倾向于加以量化的做法。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from late Latin susceptibilis, from Latin suscipere 'take up, sustain', from sub- 'from below' + capere 'take'

entry.tran: 易受…影响的;易为…左右的
entry.def: If you are susceptible to something or someone, you are very likely to be influenced by them.

example.ex: Young people are the most susceptible to advertisements...
example.tran: 年轻人最容易受广告的影响。

example.ex: James was extremely susceptible to flattery...
example.tran: 詹姆斯听几句奉承话就忘乎所以。

entry.tran: 易受(伤)的;易患(病)的;体质过敏的
entry.def: If you are susceptible to a disease or injury, you are very likely to be affected by it.

example.ex: Walking with weights makes the shoulders very susceptible to injury...
example.tran: 负重行走时肩膀很容易受伤。

example.ex: Diesel exhaust is particularly aggravating to many susceptible individuals.
example.tran: 许多体质敏感的人尤其反感柴油废气。

entry.def: A susceptible person is very easily influenced emotionally.

means.word_mean: 1. (often followed by `of' or `to') yielding readily to or capable of;

auth_sentence.content: Juvenile organisms could be most susceptible to these changes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Juvenile organisms could be most susceptible to these changes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Juvenile organisms could be most susceptible to these changes.

auth_sentence.content: Dogs are more susceptible to accidental poisoning than cats.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dogs are more susceptible to accidental poisoning than cats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dogs are more susceptible to accidental poisoning than cats.

auth_sentence.content: This may have made them susceptible to the infection.
auth_sentence.res_content: This may have made them susceptible to the infection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This may have made them susceptible to the infection.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易受感染的,易受影响的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sus在……下面+cept拿+ible可..的→能被拿下→易受影响
sus在……下面+cept拿+ive……的→有拿下的能力→有接受力的
sus在……下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
sus在……下面+spect看→在下面看一看→suspect怀疑
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂
sus在……下面+pens挂+e→一颗心挂着
sus在……下面+spir呼吸+e→喝望
sus在……下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑
de坏+cept拿,抓,握住+ive……的→拿坏的东西来→欺骗性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易受感染的,易受影响的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sus下+cept拿+ible能……的→能被[病]拿下→易受影响
accept[v.接受;承认]+ability能……→接受能力
con共同+cept拿,抓,握住→共同把握→共同的想法→观念,概念
except[v.&prep.除外]+ion表名词→n.除外,例外
in进入+cept拿,抓,握住+ion动作或状态→开始拿住→开端
per全部+cept拿,抓,握住+ion状态→全部抓住→理解;感知
pre预先+cept拿,抓,握住→预先拿好的话→箴言
re再+ceipt=cept抓→再次拿到→得到的收据
re再+cept拿,抓,握住+acle东西→拿东西的东西→容器
ac再+cept拿,抓,握住→一再拿→接受
inter在……中间+cept拿住→拦截
ex出+cept拿,抓,握住→拿出

means.word_mean: 易受影响的; 易动感情的

sentences.en: Children are more susceptible than adults.
We are all susceptible to advertising.
sentences.cn: 我们都易受广告的影响。

sentences.en: He's so susceptible that she easily gained his affection.
sentences.cn: 他易受感情影响, 所以她很轻易地就得到了他的爱。

means.word_mean: 过敏的; 易受…感染的

sentences.en: In his weakened condition, he is very susceptible to cold.
sentences.cn: 他身体很弱, 因此很容易患感冒。

sentences.en: A signed agreement is not susceptible of change.
sentences.cn: 已签署的协议不可再改动。

sentences.en: His statement is susceptible of another interpretation.
sentences.cn: 他的陈述可以有另一种解释。

jushi.english: He's so susceptible that she easily gained his affection.
jushi.chinese: 他易受感情影响，所以她很轻易地就得到了他的爱。

A signed agreement is not susceptible of change.
